name: Komplex City
overview: Komplex sequel titled Komplex City never came out. Fortunately, the cassette with the game, which was considered lost for a long time, finally came to light in February this year. And in April, through the efforts of fighters from the TZX Vault website, the sequel was digitized and uploaded for general use. It turned out that Komplex City was at least technically perfect than the first part, and who knows - perhaps this game could save Legend from a sad fate.
